ing: 1 cup water, or more as needed
3 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece peeled fresh ginger, cut into thirds
des: "This highly nutritious smoothie is loaded with minerals and vitamins from apples, pears, grapes, and berries. The fresh ginger gives this tasty beverage a spicy kick that is out of this world! Add more or less water, according to preference for desired texture. You can use a pear instead of the apple, and sparkling water instead of still water."
ins: Blend water, blueberries, grapes, apple, strawberries, ginger, and agave nectar together in a blender until thick and slushy.
